subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर के लोकल कटकेंट क्या हैं?
explanation_en: Nahargarh Fort is a famous fort located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It was built by Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II for his queen.
explanation_hi: नारगढ़ कटक, राजस्थान के राजन सवाई जय सिंग II ने उनकी मात्रा के लोड़ी के लिए गया था।
